Package net.sawannaniz.databaseclient.ctrl

Class Pomieszczenie

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sawannaniz.databaseclient.ctrl.Searching
      • net.sawannaniz.databaseclient.ctrl.Pomieszczenie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SaveableToPrzychodnia
    public class Pomieszczenie
extends Searching
implements SaveableToPrzychodnia
    Represents a room where an appointment takes place, references this entity stored in Przychodnia database.
    Since:
    2023-04-09
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mateusz Marzec

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Pomieszczenie()
      Creates an empty room.
      Pomieszczenie​(int idPom)
      Creates a room by its id, as stored in Przychodnia database.
      Pomieszczenie​(int idPom, java.lang.String nr, int p)
      Creates a room identified by its number, the floor and its id - as stored in Przychodnia database.
      Pomieszczenie​(java.lang.String nr, int p)
      Creates a room based on its number and the floor.
      Pomieszczenie​(java.lang.String nr, int p, boolean bp)
      Creates a room based on the number, whether the floor is given (if yes, then with floor number too).

      • Pomieszczenie

        public Pomieszczenie​(java.lang.String nr,
                     int p,
                     boolean bp)
        Creates a room based on the number, whether the floor is given (if yes, then with floor number too).
        Parameters:
        nr - room number
        p - floor number
        bp - whether floor is to be given or not (true or false)

    • Method Detail

      • znajdzPomieszczenieDoTabelki

        public static java.lang.String znajdzPomieszczenieDoTabelki​(Database database,
                                                            int id)
        Finds a room in a Przychodnia database identified by id. Returns a String which contains room's number and the floor. If no floor is present, dash is written.
        Parameters:
        database - database that will be searched through, see Database
        id - id of the room
        Returns:
        String which contains room's number and the floor

      • search

        public java.sql.ResultSet search​(Database database,
                                 int id,
                                 java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean result)
        Finds data about the particular room (number and the floor) identified by its id.
        Specified by:
        search in class Searching
        Parameters:
        database - database that will be searched through, see Database
        id - id of the room
        result - whether searching operation was successful or not
        Returns:
        dataset in ResultSet format.

      • search

        public java.sql.ResultSet search​(Database database,
                                 java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean result)
        Finds data (id, number and floor) about all rooms in the database.
        Specified by:
        search in class Searching
        Parameters:
        database - database that will be searched through, see Database
        result - whether the operation succeeded or not
        Returns:
        dataset in ResultSet format

      • insertToDatabase

        public boolean insertToDatabase​(Database database)
        Adds a new room to the database. Room's data are placed in the object's fields before (upon creation of the object).
        Specified by:
        insertToDatabase in interface SaveableToPrzychodnia
        Parameters:
        database - database, in which the room will be added, see Database
        Returns:
        whether the operation was successful or not

      • searchDatabase

        public java.sql.ResultSet searchDatabase​(Database database,
                                         boolean jestPietro,
                                         java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean result)
        Finds the rooms that match the given criteria. The criteria are placed in the object before calling this method (upon creating the object). The criteria are ANDed.
        Parameters:
        database - database that will be searched through, see Database
        jestPietro - whether the floor is in the criteria list or not
        result - whether the operation succeeded or not
        Returns:
        dataset (room number, floor and id) in the ResultSet format

      • removeFromDatabase

        public boolean removeFromDatabase​(Database database)
        Removes the room from the database. The room is identified by id, which is a field of the previously created Pomieszczenie object.
        Specified by:
        removeFromDatabase in interface SaveableToPrzychodnia
        Parameters:
        database - database from which the room will be removed, see Database
        Returns:
        whether the operation succeeded or not

      • modifyInDatabase

        public boolean modifyInDatabase​(Database database)
        Updates data about the room in a database. The room is identified by its id, which is provided as an object's field upon its creation. The new parameters are provided as fields too.
        Specified by:
        modifyInDatabase in interface SaveableToPrzychodnia
        Parameters:
        database - database that will be modified, see Database
        Returns:
        whether the operation succeeded or not

      • setIfBezPietra

        public void setIfBezPietra​(boolean ifx)
        A setter which sets bezPietra field. bezPietra field indicates whether the room contains information about the floor or not.
        Parameters:
        ifx - whether the room contains information about the floor or not
